Minecraft for Windows (Java-Launcher) In Minecraft you first start in a gigantic 3D landscape. Now it is up to you to change this world, which consists entirely of cubes, as you wish.

Minecraft: Free demo of the iconic sandbox game

During the day you can mine raw materials undisturbed and explore the landscape. But as soon as night falls, all sorts of monsters will crawl out of their hiding places and hunt you down – so you should get some weapons and armor as soon as possible. In creative mode, on the other hand, the villains can’t harm you – ideal for letting your imagination run wild.

With the demo mode Undecided players can test Minecraft for five game days (100 minutes). To do this, you must first register for free, as for the purchase version. After logging into the Minecraft launcher, the “Play Demo” button is then available for selection. If the demo period has expired, either create a new world or access the full version.

Play Minecraft completely free in the browser

For the tenth anniversary, the manufacturer put the original version of Minecraft online for free. You don’t even need a download to play Minecraft Classic – the game just runs in your browser.

Is Minecraft free?

No, if you want to use the full version of Minecraft, you have to pay around 24 euros for it. However, you can try the popular game in a demo version for 100 minutes. In both cases, you must register in advance on the official Minecraft website. Then either start the demo mode or buy the full version.

How do I control my character in Minecraft?

Use the mouse and keyboard to control your character. Use the W, A, S, and D keys to move forward, sideways, and backward. Use the spacebar to jump, and press the Shift key to sneak. Open your inventory with the E key.

Do you need an active internet connection to play Minecraft?

Minecraft can be played both offline and online. If you just want to play alone in a single player world, you don’t need an active internet connection. However, if you want to join a server in order to play Minecraft with other users, an active internet connection is required.

last changes
